bioconda.name: peptide-shaker
bioconda.summary: Independent platform for interpretation of proteomics identification results.

biocontainers.name: peptide-shaker
biocontainers.summary: Peptideshaker is a search engine independent platform for interpretation of proteomics identification results from multiple search engines, currently supporting x!tandem, ms-gf+, ms amanda, omssa, myrimatch, comet, tide, mascot, andromeda and mzidentml. by combining the results from multiple search engines, while re-calculating ptm localization scores and redoing the protein inference, peptideshaker attempts to give you the best possible understanding of your proteomics data!
